text: hi, Jon, well, that is embarrassing, this did not come to my mind, even though it is so straightforward...thanks

happens.

So I had talked about seeing if I can get emmet working in the design manager. I looked into it but my ReactFu isn’t as sophisticated as it needs to be to figure this out.

HubSpot is using a React Port of code mirror. In order to get emmet working I have to figure out what the variable name is that is used for initializing codemirror.

Unfortunately the react codemirror thing appears to kind of abstract it. So I can’t find it. If anyone can find that variable I think I have an okay chance of being able to get it to work
A recent event thing i got from Invision App was using this: <https://splashthat.com/>
